body: Hi Grasshope, I have analyzed your file, for some wierd reason, Honeybee's component cannot read 4 breps correctly as can you see on the image below. And they cause problems. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jawJtYwsNnyV3aGknWVH2dpDq9HO-rLzPXL*5tUNFrMrLeBLc01ui7MCbYXhUewH-7xKsNDcC7UbTH2kRPaL5LkVf08kiyfa/ERROR.png) I have modified and simplified your script using cap function and now it works fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jawJtYwsNnzuX03Mw6iSMaauEEbbl2OgVbv73lrWEW483edpZhCGV8ZDIcUlHPXq08mFP1zmQ*zF*ljeRCGX2YfWu2JhKVhm/FIX.png) You could make a script that changes height of section planes inside a range so the height of floors change, too. Bests Antonello
